BIO

Hey, I'm Kendall! I'm a full stack software engineer with a background in Indigenous language revitalization and linguistics. I'm also a language activist and certified Spanish<->English interpreter/translator with international (Canada and Japan) living and work experience in language literacy education, administrative/technical support, museums and IT. While teaching English in Japan, I realized my desire to have more specific, technical skills and work on technical team projects. Now that I'm trained in front end and back end JavaScript and more, I hope to develop apps and tools that advance social justice and fulfill my creative mind. I LOVE front-end design technologies like Sass and Mapbox, as well as exploring the possibilities of Unity, Phaser and C# for game design. Hobbies: karaoke, learning Tinashe choreography, plant-based everything Pronouns: he / him / his Technical Skills: - Proficient: JavaScript, CSS3, HTML5, CSS Flexbox, React/Redux, Git, Express.js - Knowledgeable: Sass, PostgreSQL, Sequelize, Mapbox GL JS, SQL, Node.js - Familiar: Unity with C#, Phaser, Heroku, Google OAuth, Socket.IO, Webpack, Firestore/Firebase, deck.gl, Anime.js, Animate On Scroll
